title: Ground Floor LARGE ONE BEDROOM AVAILABLE !!🏡🔑😍 MAKE IT YOURS !!
posting_body: ['Discover High Quality Living at Pottery Creek - LEASING NOW!', 'Pottery Creek is a brand-new apartment community in Port Orchard, WA that offers high end studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes.', 'Here at Pottery Creek, we strive to make our community top tier.', 'Some of the community amenities we offer are a 24/7 Fitness Area, On-site Dog Park, Playground, 24/7 Emergency Maintenance & more!', 'Conveniently located 20 minutes from the Southworth Ferry and right next to HWY 16, the possibilities for shopping, food, and fun are endless!', 'Whether you are interested in a studio or a 3-bedroom home, each of our spacious floorplans comes fully equipped with a full-size washer and dryer, efficient stainless-steel appliances and a private patio or balcony for your comfort & convenience!', 'Love where you live at Pottery Creek!', 'Contact our friendly leasing team to set up your tour today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 21', 'OR Text', '21', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 694 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Modern Soft Close Drawers & Cabinets', '- New Stainless-Steel Appliances', '- Spacious Gourmet Kitchens', '- Extra Storage', '- Cable/WIFI Ready', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Magnificent White Speckled Quartz Countertops', '- Full Size Washer/Dryers in Home', 'Community Amenities', '- 24/7 Fitness Center', '- EV Charging Stations', '- Playground', '- Fenced On-Site Pet Park', '- Secure Private Garages', '- Close to HWY 16, Grocery & Coffee', '- Planned Resident Events', '- Resident Clubhouse', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Covered Parking', '- Package Acceptance', '- 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '- Brand New Community', '- Near Public Transportation', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs & Cats Allowed', '$600 pet fee.', 'Additional $300 fee for second pet.', '$35 monthly pet rent per pet.', '2 Pet Limit', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight limit restrictions apply', 'Income Requirements:', 'Household income of at least 2.5x rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Pottery Creek', '2000 SE Sedgwick Rd, Port Orchard , WA, 98366', 'G08n3Xf8z1F']
